job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: As a Software Engineer, you will be a part of a collaborative team that develops with others in Resilience to provide applications and solutions for instruments and analytical software for novel therapeutics. This role will work with stakeholders to develop software-based solutions to manufacturing challenges and develop next-generation therapies and instruments. You will join a dynamic, fast-paced organization and team developing innovative solutions, and you will need to work independently in a collaborative team.  Resilience is looking for intelligent, motivated software engineers who enjoy taking on complex challenges, work well in an agile, dynamic environment, and care about high-quality engineering best practices.
